text: <@U22PJPGK0> would you happen to have an example of formatting it with datetimeformat to be CST timezone? I am not seeing anything in the HubL Filter area on this.

HubDB complaint: the rich text editor doesn't have buttons to change text into headings. I approve of the lack of controls for font size and color, but this seems like a glaring omission. The only way you can add headings is by copying and pasting one from somewhere else.
Also, there's no button for editing the source like in the page editor. Less important, but would be nice.
I do think code editor not being there is a huge hole. Heading may be useful also for clients
Code editing is lively debate. Developers need it, but marketers get themselves into trouble way too often
Wouldn't it be fancy if marketing people didn't have access to code edit unless they had a developer permission / access?
I know there isn't any dev permissions yet. we have all sorts of other ones.
